name: SolarShip by BardiaCrunch
description:
(set your browser zoom to 100% or Normal)

SolarShip v1: A combat ship fueled with immense amounts of energy.
This ship type has hyper power absorbent plating that makes it be able to use solar flares emitted from stars. This beast only feeds by HARVESTING the power of dwarf stars.

CONTROLS:
left mouse button : move
right mouse button : shoot

TIPS:
Survive as much as you can.
Don't let [Bomb Drones] reach your dwarf sun.
Don't run out of fuel.

[Without GneissKitty's help this game could not see the light of day.]
[A HUGE THANK YOU TO GneissKitty.]
